doc.field: Series VI. Photographs and Digital Media
Series VI. Photographs and Digital Media

Subseries VI.A. largely consists of photographs of events organized by the New York City Soil and Water Conservation District (NYCSWCD), particularly the Envirothon â€“ a national environmental science competition for high school students. Photographs of this event exhibit New York City students from all five boroughs engaging with hands-on activities in natural resource areas such as Alley Pond and Central Park. Other photographs in this subseries show a boat trip around Manhattan on a New York Water Taxi, a NYCSWCD event held at PS 28, and the City Club's annual Earthling Awards.
